Container.Name: MusicBrainz
Container.Overview: Locally hosted mirror of musicbrainz for use in conjunction with headphones etc...
Container.Description: Locally hosted mirror of musicbrainz for use in conjunction with headphones etc...[br][br][b]First time it runs it will download the latest musicbrainz db dump[br] (VERY LARGE DOWNLOAD, > 5GB)[br][br][b][span style="color: red"]YOU WILL NEED A CODE FROM MUSICBRAINZ FOR THIS TO AUTO UPDATE THE DATABASE, REGISTER HERE.[br][url]https://metabrainz.org/supporters/account-type[/url][/span]
